CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 原则；基本原理；道德准则；（行动、思想的）理由；信念；信条；规律；定律；准则；主义；纲领

synonym.mean: 原理，原则；主义，道义；本质，本义；根源，源泉

sample.mean: v. 认为…很有可能；期望；预料；先于…行动；盼望；为…早做准备；在… 之前来到
v. 解放；使不受（法律、社会或政治的）束缚；使…摆脱父亲（或家长）的威权；使摆脱奴役
adj. 市的；市政府的；市（政）的；地方的；地区的；地方政府的
v. 参与；参加；具有；带有
adj. 首要的；主要的；本金的；母金的
n. 参与者；参加者

sub_affix_info_list.affix_mean: suffix 表示器具名称:bridle  ｜  thimble

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指一直公认的。陈述各种现象的条理或关系的公理或定理等。
普通用词，含义广。指作判断的基础或行动的普通准则；也指自然科学的规律。
多指经过推理或演算能得到证明的原理、定理或定律。

word_group.brief_definition: 大体上, 原则上, 在理论上
根据行为准则；按照原则
泡利不相容原理（同PAULI EXCLUSION PRINCIPLE）
人择原理；人类生存限制宇宙论的原则

bilingual.source: The strongest principle of growth lies in human choice.
bilingual.target: 成长的最强原则在于人的选择。

bilingual.source: Confucius identified the concept ren as the most important principle in life.
bilingual.target: 孔子认为仁是生活中最重要的原则。

bilingual.source: Mencius explained this principle as "loving one's parents, loving people, loving everything in the world".
bilingual.target: 孟子解释这个原则为“爱父母，爱人，爱世间万物”。

bilingual.source: The principle of self-determination is fundamental to human rights.
bilingual.target: 自决原则是人权的基本原则。
她的教育原则非常严格。

bilingual.source: We should have the principle of honesty.
bilingual.target: 我们应该秉持诚信的原则。

bilingual.source: She believes in the principle of excelsior.
bilingual.target: 她相信精益求精的原则。

bilingual.source: He always acts according to his principle.
bilingual.target: 他总是按照他的原则行事。

yingyinNormal.en: Number four: The Principle of Comparative Advantage.
It's not about the sandwich. It's about the principle. Yeah, principle. And a little bit sandwich. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这不仅仅是三明治。而是原则问题。对，原则问题。三明治也有点关系。对。

yingyinNormal.en: Then not only did you violate the rules, you also failed to understand the principle lesson.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样说的话，那你就不光违反了条令，同时你对课程原则的理解也有错误。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the principle of comparative advantage and it has persuaded many countries to sign up to free-trade agreements.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是比较优势原则，它也说服大家签订许多自由贸易协议。

yingyinNormal.en: This principle is enshrined in our Constitution and jurisprudence. Parties may not contract around it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 宪法及法学界均认为该项原则不可侵犯，双方当事人不得就此自行约定。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you, as a United States senator, personally comfortable saying to a grieving parent, Superman could have saved your child, but on principle, we did not want him to act?
yingyinNormal.zh: 而你，作为一名美国参议员，能否很坦然地对沉浸在悲痛中的父母说“超人本可以救你的孩子，但原则上来说，我们不希望他去救？”

yingyinNormal.en: Leonard, where do you stand on the anthropic principle?
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德，你同不同意人择原理?

yingyinNormal.en: That's sort of like the "uncertainly principle." Ba-dum-bump.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就有点像"不确定性原理"。当里个当。

yingyinNormal.en: I know what the anthropic principle is. Of course. I just explained it to you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道人择原理是什么。当然啊，我刚给你解释完。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, guys. Yeah, wait, Raj, where do you stand on the anthropic principle? I'm all for it. Attaboy!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们俩好啊。对了，拉杰，你同不同意人择原理呢？完全同意，好孩子。

yingyinNormal.en: I've always wanted to fly one of these things. Can you shoot? Blasters, I can. Okay, same principle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一直都想着能驾驶一下TIE战斗机呢，你会射击吗？我会用爆能枪。好，原理是一样的。

yingyinNormal.en: He's proved to be a valuable ally during these uncertain times. And a principle force keeping Dominic and the Brotherhood in check.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他是我们在此一动荡时期的可靠同盟，可以制衡多米尼克和兄弟会的力量。

yingyinNormal.en: My point is, Sheldon, the legal principle is, ambiguity in a contract benefits the party that did not draft it, in this case, Leonard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的重点是，谢尔顿，法律准则是合同中的意义不明确使未参与起草的一方受益，在本案中，是莱纳德。

yingyinNormal.en: This brings me to my first and most fundamental principle, which is that you need to think for yourself about what is true. So let's get started.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是第一条最基础的法则，你需要自己思考分辨是非。那么我们开始吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, the holographic principle suggests that what we all experience every day in three dimensions may really just be information on a surface located at the farthest reaches of our cosmos.
yingyinNormal.zh: 全息原理提出的观点是：人类每天在三维空间感受的一切，可能只是宇宙最遥远的地方的全息投影，我们感受到的宇宙其实是外界的信息。

yingyinNormal.en: You can think about Heisenberg's "uncertainty principle" much like the special order menu that you find in certain Chinese restaurants, where you have dishes in column A and other dishes in column B.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可以觉得海森堡的"不确定性原理"就像是在某些中国餐馆里的每日特供菜单，你会发现有些菜在A栏里，有些菜在B栏里。

yingyinNormal.en: The anthropic principle states that if we wish to explain why our universe exists the way it does, the answer is that it must have qualities that allow intelligent creatures to arise who are capable of asking the question. As I am doing so eloquently right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 人择原理指出如果我们想解释为何宇宙是我们看到的这种样子，那会是因为它必须像现在这样演化出能问出这道问题的智慧生物，才会有这个问题的出现，而我现在就正问着这问题呢。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 大体上；原则上；在理论上

sense_info_list.en: a fundamental truth or proposition that serves as the foundation for a system of belief or behavior or for a chain of reasoning

examination_example.sentence: Scientists say the compound is likely to cause cancer but have no hard scientific proof on the basis of the precautionary <highlight>principle</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家表示，这种化合物可能会导致癌症，但没有基于预防原则的确凿的科学证据。

examination_example.sentence: The Constitutional <highlight>principles</highlight> that Washington alone has the power to "establish a uniform Rule of Naturalization" and that federal laws precede state laws are noncontroversial.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些宪法原则是无可争议的：唯有华盛顿（联邦政府）有权“制定统一的入籍准则”，且联邦法律高于州法律。

examination_example.sentence: Since the days of Aristotle, a search for universal <highlight>principles</highlight> has characterized the scientific enterprise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自亚里士多德时代起，对普遍原则的探索就成为科学事业的特征。

sense_info_list.en: a general scientific theorem or law that has numerous special applications across a wide field

sample.mean: v. 认为…很有可能；期望；预料；先于…行动；盼望；为…早做准备；在… 之前来到

adj. 首要的；主要的；本金的；母金的
n. 参与者；参加者

word_usage.usage: principle表示“操守; 道义”时，为不可数名词。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 有道德原则的；原则性强的；原则性的；基于既定规则的

word_family.mean: n. 原理；原则；起源；本原；基本原理；规范；实质；本质；原则性；要素

sense_info_list.en: a fundamental truth or proposition that serves as the foundation for a system of belief or behavior or for a chain of reasoning

examination_example.sentence: Another clothing company, Patagonia, a high-end outdoor clothing store, follows the same <highlight>principle</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 高端户外服装品牌巴塔哥尼亚 (Patagonia) 也有着同样的理念。

examination_example.sentence: Their approach is flexible enough that in <highlight>principle</highlight> other important quality-of-life changes could be incorporated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们的方法很灵活，原则上可以纳入其他重要的生活质量变化。

sense_info_list.en: a general scientific theorem or law that has numerous special applications across a wide field

examination_example.sentence: This idea is based on the <highlight>principle</highlight> that lions and other predators are far less likely to attack when they feel they are being watched.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个想法是基于这样一种原理，即当狮子和其他掠食者感到被监视时，它们发动攻击的可能性要小得多。

examination_example.sentence: Through regular regional educational meetings, a large annual meeting, individual farm visits and thousands of phone calls, the Amburghs pass on the <highlight>principles</highlight> pasture management.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过定期的区域性教育会议，大型年会，个人农场访问和数千个电话，Amburghs 传达了牧场管理的准则。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a fundamental truth or proposition that serves as the foundation for a system of belief or behavior or for a chain of reasoning

examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过团队合作掌握基本原则。

examination_example.sentence: This "successor <highlight>principle</highlight>" is part of the foundation of our numerical (数字的) cognition, but requires extensive practice to understand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个“后继原则”是我们认知数字的部分基础，但它需要广泛的实践才能被理解。

examination_example.sentence: Brent Ryan, who teaches urban design at MIT, says Songdo proves a universal <highlight>principle</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在麻省理工学院教授城市设计的 Brent Ryan 表示，松岛新城证实了一条放之四海而皆准的法则。

sense_info_list.en: a general scientific theorem or law that has numerous special applications across a wide field

examination_example.sentence: This type of play—especially with building blocks—helps children discover and develop key <highlight>principles</highlight> in math and geometry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种类型的游戏——尤其是积木——帮助孩子接触和发展数学和几何的关键原理。

examination_example.sentence: Either way, it's the same <highlight>principle</highlight>: the image is made by cleaning away the dirt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论哪种方式，都是一样的原理：图像是通过清除污垢而形成的。

examination_example.sentence: His manuals including The Royal Parisian Baker and the massive five-volume Art of French Cooking Series (1833-1847, completed after his death) first systematized many basic <highlight>principles</highlight> of cooking, complete with drawings and step-by-step directions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的手册包括 Royal Parisian Baker 和庞大的五卷法国烹饪艺术系列(1833-1847，在他去世后完成)，首先系统化了许多烹饪的基本原理，并附有图纸和分步指导。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a fundamental truth or proposition that serves as the foundation for a system of belief or behavior or for a chain of reasoning

examination_example.sentence: A new exhibition in Halifax uses everyday activities to explain the hidden math <highlight>principles</highlight> we all use on a regular basis.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Halifax的一个新展览利用日常活动来解释我们都经常使用的隐藏的数学原理。

examination_example.sentence: Actually, a true eco-friendly trip must meet the following <highlight>principles</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，一次真正的环保之旅必须符合以下原则。

examination_example.sentence: I think it is a general <highlight>principle</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为这是一个普遍的原则。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a fundamental truth or proposition that serves as the foundation for a system of belief or behavior or for a chain of reasoning

examination_example.sentence: Justin wrote this letter to say sorry to the <highlight>principle</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Justin写了这封信向校长道歉。

examination_example.sentence: Yu says that a zero-waste life follows the 6R <highlight>principle</highlight> --Refuse, Reduce, Reuse, Repair, Recycle and Rot(腐烂）.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 于媛说，零浪费生活遵循6R原则——拒绝、减少、再利用、修复、回收和腐烂。

examination_example.sentence: When Yu followed the <highlight>principle</highlight> of zero waste 6R, she and her boyfriend Joe Harvey both produced only two cans of rubbish.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当于遵循零浪费6R原则时，她和男友Joe Harvey都只产生了两罐垃圾。
